subject: The CNN Political Ticker PM, Wednesday, May 30, 2007
body:
CNN.com - CNN Political Ticker










For the latest, breaking political news, check for updates
throughout the day on the CNN Political Ticker
http://www.cnn.com/ticker All politics, all the
time.

Today on the Ticker

Sources: Thompson to take big step toward White
House run

WASHINGTON (CNN) -- Former U.S.
Sen. Fred Thompson will take a major step toward a 2008 run for
the White House by "testing the waters" -- beginning to raise
money and hire campaign staff as early as Friday, several
sources close to Thompson told CNN.

Full story:
http://www.cnn.com/2007/POLITICS/05/30/thompson.2008/index.html

***

Bush requests more
money for international AIDS fight

WASHINGTON
(CNN) -- President Bush asked Congress on Wednesday to triple
the funding for his international AIDS initiative and extend
the program an additional five years. 

Full story:
http://www.cnn.com/2007/POLITICS/05/30/bush.aids/index.html

***

Bush names Zoellick for
World Bank

WASHINGTON (CNN) -- U.S. President
George W. Bush said Wednesday he will nominate Robert Zoellick
to be the 11th president of the World Bank, replacing Paul
Wolfowitz, who was forced to step down.

Full story:
http://www.cnn.com/POLITICS/blogs/politicalticker/2007/05/bush-names-zoellick-for-world-bank.html

***

Bush, Putin to meet as rift between nations
widens

WASHINGTON (AP) -- With U.S.-Russian
relations under heavy strain, President Bush and President
Vladimir Putin will meet July 1 and 2 in Kennebunkport, Maine,
administration officials said Wednesday.

Full story:
http://www.cnn.com/POLITICS/blogs/politicalticker/2007/05/bush-putin-to-meet-as-rift-between.html

***

Latinos favor Clinton, campaign says

WASHINGTON (CNN) -- Sen. Hillary Clinton's presidential
campaign touted the New York Democrat's popularity with Latino
voters Wednesday, the same day Los Angles Mayor and prominent
Latino Antonio Villaraigosa is set to endorse Clinton's bid for
the White House.

Full story:
http://www.cnn.com/POLITICS/blogs/politicalticker/2007/05/latinos-favor-clinton-campaign-says.html

***

Clinton woos 'Young Hollywood'

ATLANTA, Georgia (CNN) -- Is life intimating art on the
campaign trail when Sen. Hillary Clinton, D-New York, makes a
trip to Hollywood Wednesday night?

Full story:
http://www.cnn.com/POLITICS/blogs/politicalticker/2007/05/clinton-woos-young-hollywood.html

***

Romney: Iraq has left military stressed

DES MOINES, Iowa (AP) -- Republican presidential
candidate Mitt Romney on Wednesday repeated his call to add
more troops, saying the Iraq war had left the nation's military
seriously stressed.

Full story:
http://www.cnn.com/POLITICS/blogs/politicalticker/2007/05/romney-iraq-has-left-military-stressed.html
